oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kitāb Sharḥ Ibn Qāsim al-ʻAbbādī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Waraqāt lil-Shaykh Jalāl al-Dīn al-Maḥallī : manuscript, 1649
Sharḥ Ibn Qāsim al-ʻAbbādī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Waraqāt lil-Shaykh Jalāl al-Dīn al-Maḥallī
Sharḥ ʻalá Sharḥ al-Waraqāt
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ibn Qāsim al-ʻAbbādī, Aḥmad , -approximately 1585
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: ʻAṭṭār, Muḥammad Salīm ibn Yāsīn , 1817 or 1818-1890 (former owner.)
ʻAjlūnī, Sulaymān ibn ʻAbd al-Hādī (former owner.)
Kuzbar, ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad (former owner.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to the colophon (f. 60r), copy completed on 16 Rajab 1059 AH [July, 25, 1649 AD].
Written in one column, 25 lines per page, in black and red.
With: Sharḥ al-Waraqāt / li-Jalāl al-Dīn al-Maḥallī (ff. 53r-60r).

Ownership statements on f. 1r signed Sulaymān ibn ʻAbd al-Hādī al-Jarrāḥī al-ʻAjlūnī dated 1149 AH [1736 or 7 AD], Muḥammad ibn al-Sayyid Yaḥyá al-Dasūqī al-Shāfiʻī dated 1161 AH [1748 AD], ʻAlī ibn al-Sayyid Muḥammad al-Dasūqī dated 1203 AH [1788 or 9 AD], ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad Kuzbar (?) and Salīm al-ʻAṭṭār.
MS Arab 202. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
